body_html: I don't think this is a PyTorch problem because the error is properly thrown here. With a 0-dim tensor, it should be an error when calling .size(0). Maybe open an issue on OpenNMT-py?
body_text: I don't think this is a PyTorch problem because the error is properly thrown here. With a 0-dim tensor, it should be an error when calling .size(0). Maybe open an issue on OpenNMT-py?
body: I don't think this is a PyTorch problem because the error is properly thrown here. With a 0-dim tensor, it should be an error when calling `.size(0)`. Maybe open an issue on OpenNMT-py?
